ProvisionedConcurrencyConfiguration.description: A provisioned concurrency configuration for a function's version.

properties.name: ProvisionedConcurrentExecutions
properties.description: The amount of provisioned concurrency to allocate for the version.

type.description: The amount of provisioned concurrency to allocate for the version.

RuntimePolicy.description: Runtime Management Config of a function.

properties.name: RuntimeVersionArn
properties.description: The ARN of the runtime the function is configured to use. If the runtime update mode is manual, the ARN is returned, otherwise null is returned.

type.description: The ARN of the runtime the function is configured to use. If the runtime update mode is manual, the ARN is returned, otherwise null is returned.

properties.name: CodeSha256
properties.description: Only publish a version if the hash value matches the value that's specified. Use this option to avoid publishing a version if the function code has changed since you last updated it. Updates are not supported for this property.

type.description: Only publish a version if the hash value matches the value that's specified. Use this option to avoid publishing a version if the function code has changed since you last updated it. Updates are not supported for this property.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A description for the version to override the description in the function configuration. Updates are not supported for this property.

type.description: A description for the version to override the description in the function configuration. Updates are not supported for this property.

properties.name: FunctionName
properties.description: The name of the Lambda function.

type.description: The name of the Lambda function.

properties.name: ProvisionedConcurrencyConfig
properties.description: Specifies a provisioned concurrency configuration for a function's version. Updates are not supported for this property.

type.description: Specifies a provisioned concurrency configuration for a function's version. Updates are not supported for this property.

properties.name: RuntimePolicy
properties.description: Specifies the runtime management configuration of a function. Displays runtimeVersionArn only for Manual.

type.description: Specifies the runtime management configuration of a function. Displays runtimeVersionArn only for Manual.
